# Welcome to Your Spotify Listening Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into your personal Spotify listening habits.

## Dashboard Pages

- **Summary**: Overview of your Spotify listening patterns and trends
- **Artists**: Top artists analysis and listening streaks

## Getting Started

Navigate to the [Summary](summary.html) page to explore your listening data, or check out your [Artists](artists.html) page to discover insights about your favorite artists.

---

*Data is automatically updated from your Spotify listening history*
